name: Soccer Hero! - Blocky Penalty Kick Goal Stars 2016 Football Championship Edition
name_original: Soccer Hero! - Blocky Penalty Kick Goal Stars 2016 Football Championship Edition
description:
Be the Football HERO who challenges the WORLD and wins the Champion CUP!

Soccer Hero is a fun and challenging soccer sport physics game!

The referee whispers down the match, your manager gives you an unbelievable opportunity to beat the top eleven and be the ultimate champion!

Controls:
- Aim, Flick and Swipe to Kick the Football

Features:
- Challenging and addictive gameplay
- Real Football shootout Actions
- Funny Blocky Graphics
- Penalty kicks
- Collect the secret items: Messi, Aston Villa, Barcelona, Brazil Teams

Be aware:
Angry Zlatan attacks the goal keepers!

You must kick the ball in the goal. Are you skilled enough to score all goals?
Look out cause Suarez bites everyone!
